translations: v.扣押，强制管理（债务人资产）；没收；宣布……破产

sentences.sentence: No one can sequestrate his estates.
sentences.translation: 任何人都不能没收他的资产。

sentences.sentence: Scientists at Cornell University, led by Lehmann, are working on ways to sequestrate carbon in biochip-enriched soil.
sentences.translation: 在莱曼的带领下，康奈尔大学的科学家们正在研究如何将碳从富含生物炭的土壤中分离出来。
